item.title: How to: Blog w/ Hugo and Github Pages
item.description: This tutorial focuses on building exactly this: a Hugo site! If you follow these two videos, you should be able to build your own site and customize it within minutes. Please feel free to ask questions or drop some suggestions below! Setup Your Blog Customize! Enjoy!
